title: The Spelling Bee
subtle:

description: One of the most valuable lessons a person can learn is the importance of empathy and understanding, and Jasmine in The Spelling Bee learns just that! Through realistic situations and engaging text about a girl in a school spelling bee, students will learn this important life lesson while also analyzing characters and making, revising, and confirming predictions. The book and lesson are also available for levels L and O.
